0:
Welcome to your first day of training, Heist Meister.
    Please move to the next objective marker.
    Use the [W] [A] [S] [D] keys to move.
1:
Excellent. Now interact with objects such as doors by clicking it
    while within close proximity.
2:
Light are out from here on. Use your nightvision to navigate through
    the dark by pressing [SPACE]. Head to the next objective.
3: Pick up the target loot. Be careful, do not raise suspicion.
4: You got it! Head to the extraction point!
